reviewText:
I bought two of these, one for myself and one for my wife. These turned out to be a poor purchase for reasons noted below. 
 
I am rating these with the price point in mind: 
 
PROS 
+ Reasonably small form-factor 
+ Solid enough construction 
 
CONS 
- Limited flexibility (once moved, the arms slowly return a bit to their original position) 
- Brightest setting not terribly bright 
- Work for about one to three minutes per power cycle 
 
When I received these lights I placed new batteries in them. Once turned on, no matter the setting, the lights slowly dimmed until they were unusable. This happens with both lights. Thinking I purchased a bad lot number for the batteries I bought some more batteries from a different manufacturer. The lights behaved exactly the same. Turn them on and they slowly dimmed to a point too dark to be useful. Turn them off and back on and the cycle repeats; bright, then slowly dims over one to three minutes. 
 
Unfortunately the lights I received server no practical purpose. Your mileage may vary.
